entries.name: chain
entries.desc: The certificate chain constructed by the last call of verify.

entries.name: error
entries.desc: The error code set by the last call of verify.

entries.name: error_string
entries.desc: The description for the error code set by the last call of verify.

entries.name: verify_callback
entries.desc: The callback for additional certificate verification. It is invoked for each untrusted certificate in the chain. The callback is invoked with two values, a boolean that indicates if the pre-verification by OpenSSL has succeeded or not, and the StoreContext in use. The callback must return either true or false.

entries.name: add_file(file) → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Adds the certificates in file to the certificate store. file is the path to the file, and the file contains one or more certificates in PEM format concatenated together.

entries.name: add_path(path) → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Adds path as the hash dir to be looked up by the store.
